name: Asteroid Escape
description:
A very small game made for Two Feet Studios' IX Art Kick: "Escape".

Get your highest score by avoiding and destroying asteroids! Post them in the comments :)
Or jump into the local multiplayer dogfighting mode and be the last to survive!!

A game by Pendrill
8Bit Wonder Font by Joiro Hatgaya
Music By Bit Bert
Explosion FX by like, a hundred bears
Spaceship sprite by ChrisN
Spinning Planet Animation By Fungifurball
Shooting Sprites by CleanCutGames
SpaceBackground By Ansimuz
Sound Effects By TheDweebMan, Pumodi, and ProjectsU012
Special Thanks to Michelle Chang
